Detailed Description

CUDA device arrays.

Noncopyable.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int cuda::Array::channels (  )  const [inline]

Get the number of channels in one texel of the array.

Returns:
the number of channels in one texel of the array (in elements)

size_t cuda::Array::elementSize (  )  const [inline]

Get the size of one element.

Returns:
the size of one element

Format cuda::Array::format (  )  const [inline]

Get the format of the array.

Returns:
the format of the array

unsigned int cuda::Array::height (  )  const [inline]

Get the height of the array.

Returns:
the height of the array

size_t cuda::Array::pitch (  )  const [inline]

Get the pitch of the array.

The pitch is equal to width * channels * elementSize.

Returns:
the size of one row in the array (in bytes)

size_t cuda::Array::size (  )  const [inline]

Get the size of the array (in bytes).

The size is equal to height * pitch.

Returns:
the size of the array

unsigned int cuda::Array::width (  )  const [inline]

Get the width of the array (in texels).

Returns:
the width of the array (in texels)
